attributes.action: Theresa May to keep her Job if her deal is passed
attributes.additional_details:
2nd Iron lady of polotics has stuck around where others would have quit. 
Save her Job as PM
attributes.background: Theresa May stepped up regardless of her own views on Brexit and tried to deliver on the Peoples vote. Theresa May has done her best with what she has been given and should not he ousted after HER deal is put through, she should see this process through.
